Player History
Drafted in 9th round, 130th overall pick, by Boston in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Daniel Helmer (SEA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/9/2015, off Raymond Carollo (SLB)...
Injured on 5/10/2015 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/17/2015, hitting .444 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/7/2016 to a 2-year deal worth $2,555,000 per year...
Injured on 7/6/2017 with a Pulled Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/24/2018 to a 2-year deal worth $2,439,000 per year...
